column1: My friend's kindness touched my heart.
I enjoyed the first half of the book, but the ending was disappointing.
The customer service was great, but the food was mediocre.
The concert was amazing, but the venue was too crowded.
I love the design of this product, but it's not very functional.
The trip was fun overall, but the weather was terrible.
